title: 3 and Out - Gruden Exposed; Dak's Ceiling; Brady's Discounts; Middle Class FA Squeeze; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Gruden Exposed; Dak's Ceiling; Brady's Discounts; Middle Class FA Squeeze; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why it's clear Jon Gruden has no idea how to build a team, what Dak Prescott's new contract limits the Cowboys chances to win a Super Bowl, why Tom Brady continues to make it easier for his teams to win by taking a discount, why the middle class free agents are going to get hit the hardest during this offseason, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
